name: UniPurge
description:
Final Degree Project For "Grado de Diseño y Desarrollo de Videojuegos" On UJI year 2022.

Memory will be linked on here when publicly available.

UniPurge is a game based around a procedural generation system of an entire world which you must navigate around in order to find the objective NPC.

You have a tool in your disposal: Dimension shifting. By activating it, you transport yourself into a parallel dimension where time is stopped and traps can be placed. When returning to the original world those traps will activate.

But dimension shifting is not free; it costs energy and causes changes to the environment.
